languages.text: "Право умереть за Императора — привилегия, а не наказание. Это убожество ее недостойно".
"The right to die for the Emperor is a privilege, not a punishment. This wretch is unworthy of it."
languages.original_text: "Право умереть за Императора — привилегия, а не наказание. Это убожество ее недостойно".

traits.locale_text: "The right to die for the Emperor is a privilege, not a punishment. This wretch is unworthy of it."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "The right to die for the Emperor is a privilege, not a punishment. This wretch is unworthy of it."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "The right to die for the Emperor is a privilege, not a punishment. This wretch is unworthy of it."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “为帝皇而死是一种恩赐，不是惩罚。这个卑鄙小人不配享有这样的权利。”
languages.original_text: "The right to die for the Emperor is a privilege, not a punishment. This wretch is unworthy of it."

traits.locale_text: “为帝皇而死是一种恩赐，不是惩罚。这个卑鄙小人不配享有这样的权利。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「皇帝の為に死ねるのは特権だ。罰ではない。こんな惨めな奴にはふさわしくない」
languages.original_text: "The right to die for the Emperor is a privilege, not a punishment. This wretch is unworthy of it."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の為に死ねるのは特権だ。罰ではない。こんな惨めな奴にはふさわしくない」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «El derecho a morir por el Emperador es un privilegio, no un castigo, cosa que no merece».
languages.original_text: "The right to die for the Emperor is a privilege, not a punishment. This wretch is unworthy of it."

traits.locale_text: «El derecho a morir por el Emperador es un privilegio, no un castigo, cosa que no merece».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Das Recht, für den Imperator zu sterben, ist ein Privileg, keine Bestrafung. Dieser Abschaum ist dieses Rechts unwürdig."
languages.original_text: "The right to die for the Emperor is a privilege, not a punishment. This wretch is unworthy of it."

traits.locale_text: "Das Recht, für den Imperator zu sterben, ist ein Privileg, keine Bestrafung. Dieser Abschaum ist dieses Rechts unwürdig."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Le droit de mourir pour l'Empereur est un privilège, pas un châtiment. Ce misérable n'en est pas digne. »
languages.original_text: "The right to die for the Emperor is a privilege, not a punishment. This wretch is unworthy of it."

traits.locale_text: « Le droit de mourir pour l'Empereur est un privilège, pas un châtiment. Ce misérable n'en est pas digne. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "İmparator için ölme hakkı bir ceza değil, ayrıcalıktır. Bu alçak buna layık değil."
languages.original_text: "The right to die for the Emperor is a privilege, not a punishment. This wretch is unworthy of it."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator için ölme hakkı bir ayrıcalıktır, bir ceza değil. Bu alçak buna layık değil."
traits.speaker: Chorda
